name: Czechoslovakia
startIntroPart1: Oh, Czechoslovakia. Our united land of the twetieth century.
startIntroPart2: Can you lead us towards victory? Or will you fall into the dust again.
declaringWar: Some more land might as well come in handy to our people.
attacked: Is it Germany? No, just a naive militarist. Let's put up a fair fight.
defeated: Isn't a second chance possible? Please stop your land-lust.
introduction: We are Czechoslovakia, and we look for no more than mutual properity for both of us.
hateLetsHearIt: Just speak, don't waste my time!
tradeRequest: This may be beneficial for both of us.
